languages.text: "Я уйду. Не спрашивай куда, ибо тебе не надо быть там, где я. Я стану изгнанником, диким убийцей. Перед тем, как разум мой угаснет, я удалюсь от людей туда, где живут лишь нелюди и нечестивцы. Я стану их бичом, их проклятьем, крадущимся в ночи хищником, что разоряет селения и убивает всех на пути. Я буду злобой Всеотца".

"I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."
languages.original_text: "Я уйду. Не спрашивай куда, ибо тебе не надо быть там, где я. Я стану изгнанником, диким убийцей. Перед тем, как разум мой угаснет, я удалюсь от людей туда, где живут лишь нелюди и нечестивцы. Я стану их бичом, их проклятьем, крадущимся в ночи хищником, что разоряет селения и убивает всех на пути. Я буду злобой Всеотца".

languages.text: «Me marcharé. No pregunte adónde, pues no debería estar allá donde vaya. Me convertiré en un exiliado, en un asesino salvaje. Antes de que pierda por completo la cabeza, iré donde solo los seres inhumanos y malvados viven. Seré su azote, su maldición, un cazador que acecha en la noche, que asola asentamientos matándolo todo a su paso. Me convertiré en el rencor del Padre de todas las cosas».
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

traits.locale_text: «Me marcharé. No pregunte adónde, pues no debería estar allá donde vaya. Me convertiré en un exiliado, en un asesino salvaje. Antes de que pierda por completo la cabeza, iré donde solo los seres inhumanos y malvados viven. Seré su azote, su maldición, un cazador que acecha en la noche, que asola asentamientos matándolo todo a su paso. Me convertiré en el rencor del Padre de todas las cosas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我会离开。不要问我将去向何处，因为我要去的地方，并不是你该来的地方。我会成为一位流亡者，一个野蛮的杀手。我会赶在失去理智之前远离人类，前往只有异形与邪恶生物居住的地方。我将成为他们的灾祸，他们的诅咒，他们黑夜中潜行的猎手。我将在他们的巢穴肆虐，屠杀一切拦路之敌。我将成为全父的怨灵。”
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

traits.locale_text: “我会离开。不要问我将去向何处，因为我要去的地方，并不是你该来的地方。我会成为一位流亡者，一个野蛮的杀手。我会赶在失去理智之前远离人类，前往只有异形与邪恶生物居住的地方。我将成为他们的灾祸，他们的诅咒，他们黑夜中潜行的猎手。我将在他们的巢穴肆虐，屠杀一切拦路之敌。我将成为全父的怨灵。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は消えるよ。行き先は聞かないでくれ。あんたが来るべき場所ではないからな。俺は亡命者、殺戮者となるだろう。知恵が尽きる前に人間から距離を置き、人間ではない邪悪な生き物たちが住む場所へ行くつもりだ。俺はやつらの災い、呪い、そして夜に徘徊し、集落を荒らし、行く手を阻む者全てを殺すハンターとなるだろう。俺は全知の父の仇となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は消えるよ。行き先は聞かないでくれ。あんたが来るべき場所ではないからな。俺は亡命者、殺戮者となるだろう。知恵が尽きる前に人間から距離を置き、人間ではない邪悪な生き物たちが住む場所へ行くつもりだ。俺はやつらの災い、呪い、そして夜に徘徊し、集落を荒らし、行く手を阻む者全てを殺すハンターとなるだろう。俺は全知の父の仇となるのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je vais partir. Ne m'en demandez pas plus, car où que j'aille, vous n'avez pas à me suivre. Je deviendrai un exilé, un tueur implacable. Avant de perdre l'esprit, je vais prendre mes distances avec les humains et me rendre en un lieu peuplé de créatures maléfiques et non-humaines. Je serai leur fléau, leur malédiction, le chasseur qui rôde à la faveur de la nuit pour décimer des colonies entières et semer la mort dans son sillage. Je serai le bras vengeur du Père de Tous. »
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais partir. Ne m'en demandez pas plus, car où que j'aille, vous n'avez pas à me suivre. Je deviendrai un exilé, un tueur implacable. Avant de perdre l'esprit, je vais prendre mes distances avec les humains et me rendre en un lieu peuplé de créatures maléfiques et inhumaines. Je serai leur fléau, leur malédiction, le chasseur qui rôde à la faveur de la nuit pour décimer des colonies entières et semer la mort dans son sillage. Je serai le bras vengeur du Père de Tous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde gehen. Fragt nicht wohin, denn Ihr solltet nicht dort sein, wo ich bin. Ich werde ins Exil gehen, werde zu einem wilden Jäger werden. Bevor mein Verstand mich völlig verlässt, entferne ich mich von den Menschen und gehe dorthin, wo nur unmenschliche und böse Kreaturen hausen. Ich werde ihre Geißel sein, ihr Fluch, ihr Jäger, der durch die Nacht pirscht, der Siedlungen verwüstet und alles tötet, was ihm im Weg steht. Ich werde der Groll des Allvaters sein."
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

languages.text: "Gideceğim. Nereye gittiğimi sorma, aynı yerde bulunmamalıyız. Bir sürgün, vahşi bir katil olacağım. Aklımı kaybetmeden önce insanlardan uzaklaşıp insan dışıların ve aşağılık yaratıkların yaşadığı bir yere gideceğim. Onların felaketi, laneti, geceleri gözleyen avcıları olacağım. Yerleşim yerlerini yağmalayıp yoluma çıkan herkesi öldüreceğim. Yücebaba'nın kini olacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will leave. Do not ask where, for you should not be wherever I am. I will become an exile, a feral killer. Before my wits gutter out, I will draw myself apart from humans and go where only inhumans and wicked creatures dwell. I will be their scourge, their curse, their hunter that stalks in the night, that ravages settlements and kills all in his path. I will be the Allfather's spite."

traits.locale_text: "Gideceğim. Nereye gittiğimi sorma, orada sen olmamalısın. Bir sürgün, vahşi bir katil olacağım. Aklımı kaybetmeden önce insanlardan uzaklaşıp insan dışıların ve aşağılık yaratıkların yaşadığı bir yere gideceğim. Onların felaketi, lanet, geceleri gözleyen avcısı olacağım. Yerleşim yerlerini yağmalayıp yoluma çıkan herkesi öldüreceğim. Yücebaba'nın kini olacağım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
